data.event: The river Kagina passes through Shahabad and is a major source of water for the town.in and around this area ththere are so many illegal mines where under progress still government not provided a good education toon to people and good facility school and where school are with insufficient staff class room and desk and bench even mm primary Helth Center also so poor on condition the road which connect shortly with main city of gulbarghi is not yet completed past fives years theg riven was on dried hdue to illegal sand and stone mining inside the river Shahabad is located at 17.13°N 76.93°E﻿ / 17.13; 76.93.
